labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The top channel is selected properly, but it doesn't scroll to the selected channel
data.expected_result: Once you loop the channel list should scroll upwards as well as selecting the top channel
data.short_description: navigating between channels with shortcut keys doesn't scroll properly
data.steps_to_repro: - Repeatedly alt + down in a server with more channels than can fit on the screen.
